pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer has been shown to be susceptible to significant stigmatisation, because to a large extent it is concealable, it has potentially embarrassing sexual symptoms and has significant impact on the psychosocial functioning.

metaData.source:
Restoration of satisfying sex for a castrated cancer patient with complete impotence: a case study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16959662/
